plot: Leslie devises a bailout plan for Ricky's Records, home to Pawnee's children's music scene. Meanwhile, Ron speaks out against her pro-government plans. Ann promises to write April's recommendation letter only if they become best friends.

Leslie runs into unexpected problems when she proposes a "bailout" of a failing movie rental store, Ann tries to make friends with April while waiting for an answer from Chris, and Tom tries to stand up to a scary new worker at Rent-A-Swag.—jgp3553@yahoo.com

Leslie devises a bailout plan for Ricky's Records, home to Pawnee's beloved children's music scene. Meanwhile, Ron speaks out against her pro-government plans. Ann promises to write April's recommendation letter only if they become best friends.
